Title: Sensitive information in production logs
Description: The program stores sensitive information in production logs. This may allow a local attacker to gain access to sensitive information.
AffectedVersions: All versions after 2.0.0a before 2.1.2, all versions before 1.4.2
NotImpacted: All versions up to 2.0.0a, all versions starting from 1.4.2 before 2.1.2
